field.label: Environment
field.comment: There are 2 separate environments, "staging" and "production". Perform all development against the "staging" environment, do not send any production/sensitive data to it.
field.tooltip: Go to https://api-docs.shippedsuite.com/docs/environments for more info on environments.

field.label: Public Key
field.comment: Enter your generated Public Key here. Do not enter the SECRET key here.
field.tooltip: Go to https://api-docs.shippedsuite.com/docs for more info on generating API keys.

field.label: Secret Key
field.comment: Enter your generated Secret key here.
field.tooltip: Go to https://api-docs.shippedsuite.com/docs for more info on generating API keys.

field.label: Webhook Secret
field.comment: Enter your generated Webhook Secret here.
field.tooltip: Go to https://api-docs.shippedsuite.com/docs for more info on webhooks.

field.label: Widget Display
field.comment: To enable or disable the visibility of the Shipped widget.

field.label: Shipped Shield
field.comment: To enable or disable Shipped Shield package assurance.

field.label: Shipped Green
field.comment: To enable or disable Shipped Green carbon-neutral shipments.

field.label: Widget Appearance
field.comment: Change widget appearance based on light/dark theme.
field.tooltip: Setting it as "auto" will detect if it's a light or dark theme and show the appropriate widget appearance.

field.label: Default State
field.comment: Recommended setting is "Enable" where Shipped Shield/Green is automatically added to the orders.
field.tooltip: Selecting "Disable" will require the customer to manually add Shipped Shield/Green to the order.

field.label: Mandatory
field.comment: Select "Enable" if customers are required to add Shipped Shield/Green; they will not be able to remove Shipped Shield/Green from their orders.

field.label: Informational Only
field.comment: For merchant paid option, select “Enable” to only show information about Shipped; customers will not be able to add or remove Shipped from their orders.
field.tooltip: If you only want to pay for Shipped when a customer has declined the offer, keep this set as "Disable".
